title: 阻止登陆
author: chl11222
txt_content:
User /116.216.30.61:6488 has disconnected, reason: Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException: java.io.IOException: The received string length is longer than maximum allowed (22 > 16)
字符串过长，客户端出现了登陆中
怎么解决

replies.author: Deater
replies.txt_content: 名字太长,可以在启动器改名字，也可以在登录插件改限制

replies.author: Innovators
replies.txt_content:
The received string length is longer than maximum allowed (22 > 16)
意思就是玩家名太长

replies.author: CodeHz
replies.txt_content: 应该是登陆时带上后面的@xxxxxxx.xxxx了，这样基本都超长，检查客户端，你是不是选了离线登陆却使用了邮箱名
